title: Did Lettuce Kill More People in the U.S. in 2018 Than Undocumented Immigrants Did?
subtitle: Undocumented immigrants do commit crime at a lower rate than native-born U.S. citizens, but not than leafy vegetables.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Consuming tainted lettuce caused more deaths in 2018 than homicides perpetrated by undocumented immigrants.
